actions.recommendation: PSA testing: annually, from age 40: if one first-degree relative who had prostate cancer at <65yrs or female relatives diagnosed with BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene mutation breast cancer. From age 45: if history of prostate cancer on either the mother or father’s side.From age 50: every 2 years
The rash is most likely fungal.  Please follow up with a doctor if it does not respond to the anti-fungal cream
